ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... how long does it take an enchanter to lock down 2 or 3 mobs?  if it s not long enough for you to get down below 2 bubbles, you will require 0 heals, since
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:08 PM 3/1/01 -0500, you wrote:
>If you wanna talk dmg per second then just count the dmg per second you'll
>be taking after landing it on 4 mobs. Im sure they'll outdamage you and the
>SK real quick

how long does it take an enchanter to lock down 2 or 3 mobs? if it's not long
enough for you to get down below 2 bubbles, you will require 0 heals, since for
the rest of the fight, you can twist hymn/nivs/XXXXX and regen all that health
for ''free'' (free for me, since that is my normal twist in a group where the enchanter
isn't good enough to deal with me charming).
